structure.unit: ARTICLE CVI. ISLANDS AT DORAL (SW) COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

law.catch_line: No district bonds or debts to constitute debts or obligations of the county.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1580. No district bonds or debts to constitute debts or obligations of the county.
No bond, debt or other obligation of the Islands at Doral (SW) Community Development District, nor any default thereon, shall constitute a debt or obligation of Miami-Dade County, except upon the express approval and agreement of the Miami-Dade Board of County Commissioners.
